EmailTemplate.textOnly:
90 Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Hi Sharon,
That sounds great. If you want to schedule a time to talk about MBO I would love that to. You can do so by clicking on my online calendar.
Looking forward to working with you!
Sara ___________________________________ SARA CONDE Consultant Services Advisor MBO Partners
t: 703.793.6028 f: 703.793.6068 e: sconde@mbopartners.com w: www.mbopartners.com
Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com and permanently delete the e-mail and files.
From: Sharon Armstrong [mailto:humres911@aol.com] Sent: Friday, February 10, 2012 4:57 PM To: Sara Conde Subject: Re: MBO Partners_Randall Thacker
Thanks, Sara. Nice to meet you
I'm out of town this week but will check it all out when I return
Would love to learn more about MBO Partners
Sharon
Sharon Armstrong
Sent from my iPhone
On Feb 10, 2012, at 4:48 PM, Sara Conde <sconde@mbopartners.com> wrote: Hi Sharon,
My name is Sara Conde and I am Randall Thackers contact at MBO Partners. I wanted to follow up on the voicemail I left you and introduce myself. Russell runs all his billing through us and I understand you will be taking a 15% cut of his current project with NeighborWorks America. In in order to pay you we will need you to go through our vender registration which I will send to you in a separate email.
If you are curious about MBO Partners and what we do and how we work, we have a short one page overview that may answer some of your questions, which you may access by going here. I look forward to working with you,
Please feel free to reach out to me with any questions.
Take care, Sara
___________________________________ SARA CONDE Consultant Services Advisor MBO Partners
t: 703.793.6028 f: 703.793.6068 e: sconde@mbopartners.com w: www.mbopartners.com
